Experienced Data Scientist with 10+ years building software and data science solutions across multiple domains. Currently leading ML and AI initiatives at CrowdStrike. 

My latest passion is applying my skills to advanced modeling and analytics on football (soccer) tracking + event data.

**Recent work:**

- **Active Support Index (ASI)** - A metric for quantifying off-ball movement during pressure situations, Developed and validated on 10 A-League 2024/25 matches containing 7,063 pressure events and 8 million+ tracking data points from SkillCorner. Submitted to the SkillCorner x PySport Analytics Cup.
